Legal_Issue: Whether the Board's decision to deny refugee status was patently unreasonable due to ignored evidence or immaterial errors
Application_Facts: Applicant claimed refugee status based on alleged abuse by a police officer spouse
Decision_Outcome: Board denied refugee status; judicial review dismissed
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of the Board's decision
Court_Ruling: Application for judicial review dismissed; no question certified
Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged abuse by a police officer spouse
Assessment_Factor: Credibility of testimony, consistency of evidence
Procedural_Issue: Standard of review in administrative decisions
Credibility_Assessment: Testimony found inconsistent; lack of corroboration affected credibility
Application_Basis: Fear of persecution due to domestic abuse by state actor (police officer)
Evidence_Assessed: Family letters deemed insufficient; visa application considered irrelevant
Governing_Rule: Board decisions subject to patent unreasonableness standard
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Lack of credible and corroborating evidence
Cause_Description: Applicant claimed refugee status based on alleged abuse by a police officer spouse, but lacked credible evidence
Evidence_Handling: Board considered and rejected letters and visa application as insufficient or irrelevant
Evidence_Assessment: Letters from family not sufficient; visa application not relevant
Decision_Rationale: Decision supported by evidence; any errors were immaterial
